IndexTermsPage.title: A Content-Based Multimedia Server for Massively Parallel Architectures.
IndexTermsPage.abstract: The Teradata Multimedia Object Manager is a general-purpose content analysis multimedia server designed for symmetric multiprocessing and massively parallel processing environments. The Multimedia Object Manager defines and manipulates user-defined functi
